game.name: Tollway Tycoon
game.genres: 캐주얼, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Tollway Tycoon is a chaotic management sim about running a cursed highway toll plaza, hiring staff, keeping traffic flowing, and juggling disasters from potholes and crashes to zombies, UFOs, and angry protesters.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tollway Tycoon is a chaotic management sim about running a cursed highway toll plaza, hiring staff, keeping traffic flowing, and juggling disasters from potholes and crashes to zombies, UFOs, and angry protesters.
